info.title: PTAB Proceedings and Documents REST API
info.description: Public information regarding the Patent Trial and Appeal Board's (PTAB) America Invents Act (AIA) Trials, Appeals & Inteferences and associated documents.

401.description: Requestor must authenticate in order to access resource

404.description: Resouce not found or query did not return any data

401.description: Requestor must authenticate in order to access resource

404.description: Resouce not found or query did not return any data

post.description:
Return Outcome Records for given search input. Here are some examples of input format:
E.g. 1.
{
"facetMap": {"filingParty": [“board”]},
"paramMap": {},
"rows": 0,
"sortByColumn": "string",
"sortOrder": "string",
"start": 0
}
E.g. 2.
{
"facetMap": {"filingParty": ["board", “petitioner”], "type": [“notice”]},
"paramMap": {"documentNumber":"73", "title":"power of attorney"},
"rows": 20,
"sortByColumn": "type",
"sortOrder": "desc",
"start": 0
}
E.g. 3. {}
Please DO NOT copy/paste, rather type in. For more filter values, refer to the response of above GET (/documents) end point for the documents

401.description: Requestor must authenticate in order to access resource

404.description: Resouce not found or query did not return any data

get.description: Return Public PTAB Proceeding Information based on filter inputNo required parameter. By default all trials metadata would return. Filters are optional parameters that can be used to reduce the number of result.

parameters.name: proceedingNumber
parameters.description: Filters by the proceeding Number

parameters.name: technologyCenterNumber
parameters.description: Filters by the Tech center Number

parameters.name: patentOwnerName
parameters.description: Filters by the Patent Owner Name

parameters.name: partyName
parameters.description: Filters by the Petitioner Name

parameters.name: inventorName
parameters.description: Filters by the Inventor  Name

parameters.name: patentNumber
parameters.description: Filters by the Patent Number

parameters.name: declarationDate
parameters.description: Filters by the declarationDate of Interference(in yyyy-mm-dd format)

parameters.name: declarationFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by the declarationFromDate of Interference on and after (in yyyy-mm-dd format). If this date is given then declarationToDate is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: declarationToDate
parameters.description: Filters by the declarationToDate of Interference on and after (in yyyy-mm-dd format). If this date is given then declarationFromDate is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: styleNameText
parameters.description: Filters by the Interference Style Name

parameters.name: applicationNumberText
parameters.description: Filters by the Application Number

parameters.name: proceedingStatusCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the Proceeding status

parameters.name: proceedingTypeCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the proceeding Type

parameters.name: subproceedingTypeCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the sub proceeding Type

parameters.name: institutionDecisionDate
parameters.description: Filters by the institutionDecisionDate of document in yyyy-mm-dd format

parameters.name: institutionDecisionFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by the institutionDecisionDate of document on and after (in yyyy-mm-dd format). If this date is given then lastModifiedDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: institutionDecisionToDate
parameters.description: Filters by the institutionDecisionDate of document on and before (in yyyy-mm-dd format)

parameters.name: proceedingFilingDate
parameters.description: Filters by the proceedingFilingDate of document in yyyy-mm-dd format

parameters.name: proceedingFilingFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by the proceedingFilingDate of document on and after (in yyyy-mm-dd format). If this date is given then lastModifiedDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: proceedingFilingToDate
parameters.description: Filters by the proceedingFilingDate of document on and before (in yyyy-mm-dd format)

parameters.name: accordedFilingDate
parameters.description: Filters by the accordedFilingDate of document in yyyy-mm-dd format

parameters.name: accordedFilingFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by the accordedFilingDate of document on and after (in yyyy-mm-dd format). If this date is given then lastModifiedDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: accordedFilingToDate
parameters.description: Filters by the accordedFilingDate of document on and before (in yyyy-mm-dd format)

parameters.name: proceedingLastModifiedDate
parameters.description: Filters by the proceedingLastModifiedDate of document in yyyy-mm-dd format

parameters.name: proceedingLastModifiedFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by the proceedingLastModifiedDate of document on and after (in yyyy-mm-dd format). If this date is given then lastModifiedDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: proceedingLastModifiedToDate
parameters.description: Filters by the proceedingLastModifiedDate of document on and before (in yyyy-mm-dd format)

parameters.name: grantDate
parameters.description: Filters by the grantDate of document in yyyy-mm-dd format

parameters.name: grantFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by the grantDate of document on and after (in yyyy-mm-dd format). If this date is given then lastModifiedDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: grantToDate
parameters.description: Filters by the grantDate of document on and before (in yyyy-mm-dd format)

parameters.name: recordStartNumber
parameters.description: Filters the documents from the start point e.g 0 / 4 / 6

parameters.name: sortOrderCategory
parameters.description: Dictates how the result set is to be sorted. The value of the parameter may be any property name of the Document model. The parameter value may be prefixed with a - to sort descendingly or with a + to sort ascendingly. Ascendingly is the default direction if no prefix is specified.Multiple sort parameters are applied in the order specified within the query string. For example, sort=documentNumber&sort=-filingDate means "first sort by document number asecndingly, then by filing date, from most recent to least recent."

get.description: Return aggregations for Public PTAB Proceedings

parameters.name: proceedingFilingFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by the proceedingFilingFromDate of document on and after (in yyyy-mm format). If this date is given then lastModifiedDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: proceedingFilingToDate
parameters.description: Filters by the proceedingFilingToDate of document on and before (in yyyy-mm format)

401.description: Requestor must authenticate in order to access resource

404.description: Resouce not found or query did not return any data

get.description: Return PTAB Public DocumentsReturns PTAB Public Documents for given search input. No required parameters. Parameters may be provided to filter the result set. Repeated filter query parameters will be logical "OR" rather than logical "AND" Invalid query parameter values will be ignored.

parameters.name: documentTitleText
parameters.description: Filters by Document title

parameters.name: documentFilingDate
parameters.description: Filters by the date (YYYY-MM-DD) a document was filed.

parameters.name: documentFilingFromDate
parameters.description: Filters by documents filed on or before the given date (YYYY-MM-DD). If this date is given then documentFilingDateTo is mandatory to provide to get the results

parameters.name: documentFilingToDate
parameters.description: Filters by documents filed on or after the given date (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: styleNameText
parameters.description: Filters by the Interference Style Name

parameters.name: filingPartyCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the party who filed the document. Values are petitioner, patent_owner, board, or potential_patent_owner

parameters.name: patentOwnerName
parameters.description: Filters by the patent Owner Name

parameters.name: partyName
parameters.description: Filters by the Petitioner Party Name

parameters.name: documentNumber
parameters.description: Filters by the document Number

parameters.name: documentTypeName
parameters.description: Filters by the document Type such as notice, Mandatory Notice, motion, opposition, power of attorney, rehearing request, order, Judge Working File, Petion, etc.

parameters.name: documentName
parameters.description: Filters by the Document Name

parameters.name: documentIdentifier
parameters.description: Filters by the Document Id

parameters.name: proceedingNumber
parameters.description: Filters by the proceeding NUmber

parameters.name: proceedingTypeCategory
parameters.description: Filters by the proceeding Type

parameters.name: applicationNumberText
parameters.description: Filters by the application Number

parameters.name: recordTotalQuantity
parameters.description: Filters according to the size of the document like 10,20

parameters.name: recordStartNumber
parameters.description: Filters the documents from the start point e.g 0 / 4 / 6

parameters.name: sortOrderCategory
parameters.description: Dictates how the result set is to be sorted. The value of the parameter may be any property name of the Document model. The parameter value may be prefixed with a - to sort descendingly or with a + to sort ascendingly. Ascendingly is the default direction if no prefix is specified.Multiple sort parameters are applied in the order specified within the query string. For example, sort=documentNumber&sort=-filingDate means "first sort by document number asecndingly, then by filing date, from most recent to least recent."

get.description: Provides Decision Outcomes information on AIA Trials, Appeals and Intereferences based on filter inputsReturn Outcome Records for given search input. No required parameter. By default all outcome metadata would return. Filters are optional parameters that can be used to reduce the number of result.

parameters.name: decisionToDate

parameters.description: Filters by the grantDate of document on and before (in yyyy-mm-dd format)

parameters.name: patentNumber

parameters.name: recordTotalQuantity
parameters.description: Filters according to the size of the document like 10,20

parameters.name: recordStartNumber

parameters.name: sortOrderCategory
parameters.description: Dictates how the result set is to be sorted. The value of the parameter may be any property name of the Document model. The parameter value may be prefixed with a - to sort descendingly or with a + to sort ascendingly. Ascendingly is the default direction if no prefix is specified.Multiple sort parameters are applied in the order specified within the query string. For example, sort=documentNumber&sort=-filingDate means "first sort by document number asecndingly, then by filing date, from most recent to least recent."
